subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets broke a 3-3 tie with a four-run seventh inning, and new arrival Michael Tucker drove in the final run of the inning with a double to left-center field.
snippet: The Mets broke a 3-3 tie with a four-run seventh inning, and new arrival Michael Tucker drove in the final run of the inning with a double to left-center field.
